Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity

Interface Placeable

All Superinterfaces:
Anchorable, Bounded, DimensionsProvider, GameNode
All Known Subinterfaces:
AABBCollided, AABBSideAwareCollided, BufferedMoveable, Moveable, SceneBorderCrossingWatcher, SceneBorderTouchingWatcher
All Known Implementing Classes:
CenteredShapeEntity, CircleEntity, DynamicCircleEntity, DynamicEllipseEntity, DynamicRectangleEntity, DynamicSpriteEntity, DynamicTextEntity, EllipseEntity, RectangleEntity, ShapeEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity, YaegerEntity
public interface Placeable
extends Bounded, Anchorable
A Placeable has a methods that can be used to place it at a different x,y-coordinates on the YaegerScene.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Coordinate2D getAnchorLocation()
    Return the Coordinate2D where the AnchorPoint of this YaegerEntity is placed, within the YaegerScene.
    void setAnchorLocation​(Coordinate2D anchorLocation)
    Set the Coordinate2D where the AnchorPoint of this YaegerEntity will be placed, within the YaegerScene.
    void setAnchorLocationX​(double x)
    Set the x-coordinate of the AnchorLocation of this YaegerEntity;
    void setAnchorLocationY​(double y)
    Set the y-coordinate of the AnchorLocation of this YaegerEntity;
    void transferCoordinatesToNode()
    Transfer the x and y-coordinate of this YaegerEntity to its JavaFX Node and apply the requested transformations.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.Anchorable
